snippet: Heading into a presidential election, the powerful conservative right can be expected to set litmus tests for Republican candidates, Albert R. Hunt writes.

byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: Heading into a presidential election, the powerful conservative right can be expected to set litmus tests for Republican candidates, Albert R. Hunt writes.

headline.print_headline: Gay Rights Still an Issue for G.O.P. Base
headline.main: Gay Rights Still an Issue for G.O.P. Base
